page.title: 17FLEET'S CHURCHES
page.content:
Fleet has several types of Christian Churches, but none for non-Christians.
{ALL SAINTS Church of England}has just had a new organ. At the Church there is a creche and a Sunday school for the 5 year olds upwards. In Sunday School we learn about God. In Church there is a decorated altar, stained glass windows with pictures of Saints, and embroidered hassocks to kneel on.
{OUR LADY Roman Catholic Church}is decorated with Stations of the Cross around the sides. The altar has a cloth over it and two large candles. There is sometimes a choir singing.
{THE METHODIST Church}has a carved font where babies are baptized. At the front there is a plain cross and there are coloured windows all around.
